definition: ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: A material handler in the downstream location is signaled to withdraw parts.
sentences.chinese: 位于下游的物料管理员收到领取零部件的信号。

sentences.english: Adenoviruses have been modified to carry parts of the HIV virus.
sentences.chinese: 腺病毒经过改良以携带HIV病毒部件。

sentences.english: The piston-rods connect the pistons to the parts of the engine which they move.
sentences.chinese: 活塞杆把活塞和引擎中被活塞驱动的部件连在一起。

sentences.english: The retaining ring is an important component of turbogenerator.
sentences.chinese: 护环是汽轮发电机的重要部件。

sentences.english: A lost item in the hole is also called "junk".
sentences.chinese: 落在井内的部件也叫做“井底脏物”。

sentences.english: For example, the charting widget has a tests directory that contains code to get you started.
sentences.chinese: 例如，图表小部件的测试目录包含入门代码。

sentences.english: More specifically, it wraps widgets at the end of the row.
sentences.chinese: 更确切地讲，它可使窗口小部件在行尾换行。

sentences.english: We will repair or replace free of charge any non-moving part found to be defective.
sentences.chinese: 我们会对有缺陷的非移动部件免费进行维修或更换。

sentences.english: The mechanical device that moves something , usually read/write head.
sentences.chinese: 一种机械装置，用于移动诸如读写磁头之类的部件。

sentences.english: First, let's examine the parts of which a solar panel consists.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我们来看一看太阳能集热板包括的各个部件。

sentences.english: In general , a clutch has a clutch has a clutch disc as its major part.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，离合器以离合器盘为其主要部件。

sentences.english: Sofa appears the paint film of ligneous component wants smooth, colour and lustre is even.
sentences.chinese: 沙发外露木制部件的漆膜要光滑，色泽均匀。

sentences.english: This master model is a full-scale representation of a part design that incorporates all of the geometry for one of the part surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 原模应以同样比例大小展现部件表面的形状设计。

sentences.english: Prepare engineering department required spare parts list.
sentences.chinese: 准备工程部必要零部件清单。

sentences.english: “As a rule Ford adamantly refused to adopt parts and components patented by others, ” Greenleaf writes.
sentences.chinese: 作为规定，福特强烈反对接受他人零部件专利。
